text.content: Fever and chills - The fever and chills have been occurring for 2 days. There has been associated cough (green sputum).

item.content: Community acquired ... : Breathing Exercises: breathing exercises
Community acquired ... : Pneumococcal Pneumonia Shot *: immunization
Community acquired ... : Return to clinic if symptoms worsen

content.content: Patient Position: Sitting; Cuff Location: Left Arm; Cuff Size: Standard
Patient Position: Sitting; Cuff Location: Left Arm; Cuff Size: Standard
1 (one) Tablet two times daily for 7 days
2 (two) Puff every six hours, as needed for wheezing for 30 days
Patient may continue to experience low grade fever and chills
